snippet.title: Junkyard Killbots // Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Game ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/3118570/Junkyard_Killbots/

Junkyard Killbots is a rogue lite auto battler where where you build robots, equip killer items, and smash your enemies. Manage your robot army by combining items to upgrade their power or spreading them out between your bots. Scavenge new items, find new blueprints, and discover new combos!

Developed by
Philip Hansen
